BR_text.BRsummary: wider face config, ssd300_wider_face.py , why num_classes is 2?
BR_text.BRdescription:
in mmdet/datasets/wider_face.py, CLASSES only have "face"
 using the config to generate wider face dataset, each sample's label is zero
 should the num_classes be 1 not 2 ?

comments_0.comment_text: num_classes=2 including background class. This is the old config from v1.x

comments_2.comment_text:
I think the num_classes should be 1.
 if num class is 2, the background_label is 2, the label 0 is for face, the label 1 has no meaning.

comments_3.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ceykmc>@ceykmc</denchmark-link>
  ,
 Thanks for your bug report. I checked the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/open-mmlab/mmdetection/blob/v1.0.0/configs/wider_face/ssd300_wider_face.py#L20>config in v1.0</denchmark-link>
 , the  is 2. So it should be a bug where we forget to modify it consistently when we upgrading to V2.0.
